xwikidoc.name: TranslatorTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
# Class fields XWiki.Translator.TranslatorClass_title=Title
translator.translate=Translate translator.translations=Translations translator.availableTranslations=Available translations translator.actions=Actions translator.actions.translate=Translate translator.translate.modal.title=Translations translator.translate.modal.translate=Translate translator.translate.modal.translate.inProgress=Translating... translator.translate.modal.close=Close translator.translate.modal.originalDocument=Original document : translator.translate.modal.translation.language=Language translator.translate.modal.translation.title=Title translator.translate.modal.translation.date=Date
admin.translator.translate=Translate admin.translator.textToTranslate=Text admin.translator.sourceLanguage=Source language admin.translator.targetLanguage=Target language admin.translator.test=Translation test
admin.translator=Translation Service
XWiki.Translator.TranslatorConfigurationClass_enabled=Enable the translation service XWiki.Translator.TranslatorConfigurationClass_enabled.hint=Activates the ability to translate content using a machine translation service XWiki.Translator.TranslatorConfigurationClass_targetProperties=Properties to be translated XWiki.Translator.TranslatorConfigurationClass_targetProperties.hint=List of class properties and document fields to be translated, separated by a comma. Example: doc.title,doc.content,XWiki.Movie.MovieClass^storyLine XWiki.Translator.TranslatorConfigurationClass_targetClasses=Documents to be translated XWiki.Translator.TranslatorConfigurationClass_targetClasses.hint=List of classes separated by a comma. Only documents with at least one object of one of these classes will be translatable. If empty, all documents are considered translatable. XWiki.Translator.TranslatorConfigurationClass_translator=Translation service XWiki.Translator.TranslatorConfigurationClass_translator.hint=Name of the translation service XWiki.Translator.TranslatorConfigurationClass_translationNamingStrategy=Translation documents location strategy XWiki.Translator.TranslatorConfigurationClass_translationNamingStrategy.hint=Defines how the location of a generated translation gets computed: translations can be stored either at the same location as the original document, or in a space named after their language (e.g. "/en/my-document", "/fr/mon-document" etc). XWiki.Translator.TranslatorConfigurationClass_translationNamingStrategy_same=Same location as original document XWiki.Translator.TranslatorConfigurationClass_translationNamingStrategy_prefix=In a space named after their language XWiki.Translator.TranslatorConfigurationClass_apiKey=Translation service API key XWiki.Translator.TranslatorConfigurationClass_apiKey.hint=API key to be used when performing translation operations XWiki.Translator.TranslatorConfigurationClass_sameTranslationNameClasses=Documents whose translations must be at same location XWiki.Translator.TranslatorConfigurationClass_sameTranslationNameClasses.hint=List of classes for which the translations must be at the same location as their original document: this field overrides the default translation location strategy defined above. XWiki.Translator.TranslatorGlossaryConfigurationClass_translatorGlossaryNamePrefix=Glossary name prefix XWiki.Translator.TranslatorGlossaryConfigurationClass_translatorGlossaryNamePrefix.hint=Prefix of glossay name into the translator provider.
